name: Core Control
description:
Features:
  • Full Contact player vs player action!
  • 2 player local.
  • Procedual Generated Levels.
  • Gamepad support

Take over nodes to gain data and keep them secure from others. Control the most nodes in the network when all have been secured to gain access to the core and all the data stored there! Keep an eye out for golden nodes for big caches of data.

A & D player 1 (blue) rotate clockwise & anticlockwise

Left Shift player 1 boost

J & L player 2 (pink) rotate clockwise & anticlockwise

Right Shift player 2 boost

ESC quit

M Mute sound

Any feedback or questions? @yarrwulf
